潬字的基本解释

潬
tān
古同“滩”，水中沙堆。

潬
shàn
〔涴（

潬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tān］
［《廣韻》徒旱切，上旱，定。］
水中沙堆。
[②]［shàn］
［《集韻》他干切，平寒，透。］
见“潬2潬”、“宛潬”。

潬字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潬； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页650第12
【廣韻】徒旱切【集韻】蕩旱切【正韻】徒亶切，?音但。沙渚也。【爾雅·釋水】潬沙出。【註】今江東呼水中沙堆爲潬。　又地名。【地理通釋】河陽縣有三城，其中潬城東魏築。　又【集韻】【正韻】?上演切，音善。水相薄也。【司馬相如·上林賦】宛潬膠盭。【註】宛潬，展轉也。又【文心雕龍·封禪篇】潬潬噅噅，萬物盡化，言至德所被也。　又【集韻】他干切，音攤。義同。通作灘。【金石文】秦蜀守李冰官堰?云：深淘潬，䔐包?。【註】潬，古灘字。註詳十九畫。䔐字从氵从?作。

潬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
潬字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yue
tān
Gutong "beach", sand piles in the water.

〔dirty(
Yue
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tān］
["Guangyun" is only dry cut, dry up, fixed. ]
Sand piles in the water.
[②]［shàn］
["Ji Yun" he cuts dry, calm and thorough. ]
See "潬2潬", "wan潬".
Yue
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潬; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 650 No. 12
[Guang Yun] Cut dry cut only [Ji Yun] Cut dry dry cut [Zheng Yun] Cut dry cut only, sound but. Sha Zhu also. 【Erya·Release】Sand out. [Note] Today, the sand piles in the east of the river are called sand piles.　Also place name. [Geographical Explanation] Heyang County has three cities, among which Zhucheng is built in the east of the Wei Dynasty.　 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Performed cut, sound good. The water phase is thin. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Wanzhu Jiaozhu. [Note] Wan Zhu, Zhan Zhuan also. Also [Wen Xin Diao Long·Feng Zen Chapter] 潬潬噙噅, all things are exhausted, and the words are the only virtues.　[Jiyun] He did the cutting and the music booth. The same meaning. Pass for the beach. [Jin Shi Wen] Qin Shu guards Li Bing's official weir? Cloud: Shen Tao Jian, Ni Bao? [Note] 潬, Gutan word. Note 19 paintings in detail. The word is made from 氵cong.
